statements: UPDATE wrestling_feedback_ratings SET rating = 5 WHERE event_id = 1001;
UPDATE wrestling_feedback_ratings SET feedback = 'Great match, loved it!' WHERE fan_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE wrestling_feedback_ratings SET rating = 5, feedback = 'Amazing event!' WHERE event_id = 101 AND fan_email = 'john@example.com';
UPDATE wrestling_feedback_ratings SET event_name = 'Championship Match', rating = 4 WHERE event_id = 102;

UPDATE feedback_ratings SET rating=4, feedback='Great event overall' WHERE event_id=2 AND match_id=5;

UPDATE Matches SET winner='John Cena', match_type='Singles' WHERE match_id=1;
